vecUnachieved.strDescription: Complete Glumlee's part of the Main Questline
Create your 2nd character, who will probably never be as good as your 1st character.
Complete the Picnic Stowaway's part of the Main Questline
Claim 100 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 4 days and a side of fries.
Choose one of the 3 starting classes, since like there are only 3 starting classes and not 4.
You've done better than people who ditch after a few hours!
10,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy 1400 nomwiches!
Buy the Sculpting Tools so you can craft the town table
Complete 25 Quests on a single character. They're called Quests but they're more like chores tbh
Claim 2000 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 3 months but not really cuz u have multiple characters.
Collect 10 unique cards. Who knows you may even get a Baba Yaga Rookie Card!
Create your 4th character, who will never appreciate the struggle the earlier characters went through from having no family bonus stats.

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/WhatIsIdleon.png?t=1660610995[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/SteamFP5.gif?t=1660610995[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/PreviewGif1.gif?t=1660610995[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/Steam1.png?t=1660610995[/img]
•[u][b] Specialize your characters into different classes, and work toward unlocking new features![/b][/u] Your Warrior can mine ores for your Archer to craft a powerful staff, so your Mage can defeat the World Boss and unlock the next world! IdleOn™ gets more complex the more you play!

[url=https://discord.gg/idleon][img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/Discordjoin.png?t=1660610995[/img][/url]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/GenieNPCgif_x2.gif?t=1660610995[/img] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/NPCcactus_x2.gif?t=1660610995[/img] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/NPCogrefish_x2.gif?t=1660610995[/img] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/NPCscrollB1_x2.gif?t=1660610995[/img] [img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/NPCfrozenhamGIF.gif?t=1660610995[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/Steam7.png?t=1660610995[/img]
- Over 40 different NPCs, that give out 135 unique quests! Maybe you'll have to kill monsters without equipment on, or help a piggy reach 1M social media followers (that last one will make more sense in game)
- 70 different locations, spread out across different scenery -- Jungles, forests, deserts, oceans, sewers, caves, and quite a few others!

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/LavaSitting.gif?t=1660610995[/img]
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1476970/extras/Steam8.png?t=1660610995[/img]
- I'm LavaFlame2, and I've been making games since 2012. I made 31 small flash games before making IdleOn™, and while most failed terribly, I learned from the failures to make an MMO that brings something new and exciting to the table!
- With an active discord of over 100,000 users, I place a huge importance on player feedback. Weekly polls and custom suggestions drive the direction of the game, so you can rest assured this game will always be for gamers, made by a gamer!
data.strSnippet: The MMO you play while playing other games! Create multiple characters who are always working, even when you're offline! The game gets more complex the more you play, and with features like Tower Defence, Pet Battles, Cooking and more, there's never a dull moment in IdleOn™
